sentences.english: The adaptability of ground-cover Chrysanthemum group in Hainan is studied.
sentences.chinese: 文章報道了地被菊在海南引種的適應性情況。

sentences.english: And Hainan's mangrove, rich coral reef are also well-known attractions.
sentences.chinese: 此外，海南的紅樹林，豐富的珊瑚礁也是著名的景色。

sentences.english: Dalong Water Control Project is a key project in Hainan Province.
sentences.chinese: 大隆水利樞紐工程是海南省的重點工程。

sentences.english: There is no pollution along Hainan's sea, so its pearl is preeminent.
sentences.chinese: 海南沿海純淨無污染，海南珍珠品質超羣。

sentences.english: There is no pollution along Hainan's sea, so its pearl is preeminent.
sentences.chinese: 海南沿海純淨無污染，海南珍珠品質超羣。

sentences.english: The Hainan example represents the first province-wide spatial planning.
sentences.chinese: 海南省是全國第一個開展省域空間規劃的改革試點。

sentences.english: And in the same time, Hainan Special Economic Zone was established.
sentences.chinese: 海南經濟特區成立於同一時間。

sentences.english: Now we are preparing to make all of Hainan Island a special economic zone, much larger than the others.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在搞一個更大的特區，這就是海南島經濟特區。

sentences.english: The content of ent-kaurane diterpenes was highest in A. squamosa L. (hainan).
sentences.chinese: 貝殼杉烷型二萜成分以海南產圓滑番荔枝中含量最高。

sentences.english: Luobi Cave was an origin habitation area that Hainan's people lived in that was over 10 thousand years ago.
sentences.chinese: 落筆洞是距今一萬多年前最初的海南人居住的地方。

sentences.english: Fox bewitching appendages is on UIMI body, close little younger brother is south immense forest.
sentences.chinese: 狐妖附體在UIMI身體上，並收林海南爲小弟。

sentences.english: Jiaji Duck is one of the four famous Hainan dishes, which is popular with people in Qionghai.
sentences.chinese: 嘉積鴨是海南四大名菜之一，深受瓊海人喜歡。

sentences.english: ConclusionThe fingerprint established can be used for quality control of Hainan Naucleae officinalis.
sentences.chinese: 結論所建立指紋圖譜可用於海南膽木藥材的質量控制。

sentences.english: ConclusionHainan ecological environment is good, and is suitable for four south medicine large-scale plant.
sentences.chinese: 結論海南生態環境良好，適宜四大南藥的大規模種植。

sentences.english: Main dishes is hainan chicken rice with sprouts.
sentences.chinese: 主要售賣海南芽菜雞飯。

sentences.english: I have been in Hainan for about two weeks.
sentences.chinese: 我在海南乙有兩個星期了。
